reg_info.act_under: Municipal Extra-Territorial Tax Act   Loi sur les impôts municipaux extraterritoriaux

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 3 (2) of the Act, the assessment equalization factor for land of the designated business is 0.211. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 821, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of subsection 3 (2) of the Act, the assessment equalization factor for land of the designated business is 0.211. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 821, s. 1.

content.content: 2. For the purposes of subsection 3 (2) of the Act, the assessment equalization factor for similar land in the same class as land of the designated business, (a) in the Township of Marathon, is 0.926; and (b) in the Township of Manitouwadge, is 0.457. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 821, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. For the purposes of subsection 3 (2) of the Act, the assessment equalization factor for similar land in the same class as land of the designated business,

(a) in the Township of Marathon, is 0.926; and

(b) in the Township of Manitouwadge, is 0.457. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 821, s. 2.
